substitution.copyText: What is he whose grief | Bears such an emphasis
substitution.amendedText: What is he whose griefe | Bears such an emphasis ?

substitution.copyText: What is he whose grief | Bears such an emphasis
substitution.amendedText: What is he whose griefe | Bears such an emphasis ?

substitution.copyText: I prethee take thy fingers from my throat,
substitution.amendedText: I prethee take thy fingers from my throat, --

substitution.copyText: Hamlet, Hamlet. | Gentlemen. | Good my Lord be quiet.
O he is mad Laertes. | Forbear him.
Shew me what thou’t do, | Wilt weep wilt fight, wilt fast wilt tear thy self, | Wilt drink up Efil, eat a Crocodile? | I’ll do’t ; doest thou come here to whine?
substitution.amendedText: Shew me what thoust do. | Wilt weep? wilt fight, ? wilt fast wilt tear thy self,? | Wilt drink up Eifil, eat a Crocodile? | I’ll do’t --doest thou come here to whine?

substitution.copyText: Make Ossa like a wart nay, and thou’lt mouth
substitution.amendedText: Make Ossa like a wart! nay, and thou’lt mouth ,
